ontransitionstart.description: Fires when a CSS transition starts

onprogress.description: Fires when the video/audio begins downloading

onwebkitanimationiteration.description: Fires when a CSS animation repeats

onselectstart.description: Fires when beginning a text selection

onselectionchange.description: Fires when text selection is changed on the page

onpagehide.description: Fires when the page is changed

onclose.description: Fires when a dialog is closed

onfullscreenchange.description: Fires when a video changes full screen status

onmozfullscreenchange.description: Fires when a video changes full screen status

onactivate.description: Fires when the element is activated

onafterprint.description: Fires after the page is printed

onwebkitanimationstart.description: Fires when a CSS animation starts

onwebkitanimationend.description: Fires when a CSS animation ends

onanimationcancel.description: Fires when a CSS animation cancels

tags.code: <style>@keyframes x{from {left:0;}to {left: 1000px;}}:target {animation:10s ease-in-out 0s 1 x;}</style><* id=x style="position:absolute;" onanimationcancel="alert(1)"></*>

onanimationend.description: Fires when a CSS animation ends

onanimationiteration.description: Fires when a CSS animation repeats

onanimationstart.description: Fires when a CSS animation starts

onauxclick.description: Fires when right clicking or using the middle button of the mouse

onbeforeactivate.description: Fires before the element is activated

onbeforecopy.description: Requires you copy a piece of text

onbeforecut.description: Requires you cut a piece of text

tags.description: Requires you cut a piece of text

onbeforedeactivate.description: Fires before the element is deactivated

onbeforepaste.description: Requires you paste a piece of text

onbeforeprint.description: Fires before the page is printed

onbeforeunload.description: Fires after if the url changes

onbegin.description: Fires when a svg animation begins

onblur.description: Fires when an element loses focus

oncanplay.description: Fires if the resource can be played

oncanplaythrough.description: Fires when enough data has been loaded to play the resource all the way through

onclick.description: Requires a click of the element

oncontextmenu.description: Triggered when right clicking to show the context menu

oncopy.description: Requires you copy a piece of text

oncut.description: Requires you cut a piece of text

ondblclick.description: Triggered when double clicking the element

ondeactivate.description: Fires when the element is deactivated

ondragend.description: Triggered dragging is finished on the element

tags.code:
drag me
<* ondragover=alert(1) contenteditable>drop here

drag me
<* ondrop=alert(1) contenteditable>drop here

onend.description: Fires when a svg animation ends

onended.description: Fires when the resource is finished playing

onerror.description: Fires when the resource fails to load or causes an error

onfocus.description: Fires when the element has focus

onfocusin.description: Fires when the element has focus

onfocusout.description: Fires when an element loses focus

oninvalid.description: Requires a form submission with an element that does not satisfy its constraints such as a required attribute.

onkeydown.description: Triggered when a key is pressed

onkeypress.description: Triggered when a key is pressed

onkeyup.description: Triggered when a key is released

onload.description: Fires when the element is loaded

onloadeddata.description: Fires when the first frame is loaded

onloadedmetadata.description: Fires when the meta data is loaded

onloadend.description: Fires when the element finishes loading

onloadstart.description: Fires when the element begins to load

onmessage.description: Fires when message event is received from a postMessage call

onmousedown.description: Triggered when the mouse is pressed

onmouseenter.description: Triggered when the mouse is hovered over the element

onmouseleave.description: Triggered when the mouse is moved away from the element

onmouseout.description: Triggered when the mouse is moved away from the element

onmouseover.description: Requires a hover over the element

onmouseup.description: Triggered when the mouse button is released

onpageshow.description: Fires when the page is shown

onpaste.description: Requires you paste a piece of text

onpause.description: Requires clicking the element to pause

onplay.description: Fires when the resource is played

onreadystatechange.description: Fires when the ready state changes

onrepeat.description: Fires when a svg animation repeats

onresize.description: Fires when the window is resized

onsearch.description: Fires when a form is submitted and the input has a type attribute of search

ontimeupdate.description: Fires when the timeline is changed

ontoggle.description: Fires when the details tag is expanded

ontouchstart.description: Fires when the touch screen, only mobile device

ontouchend.description: Fires when the touch screen, only mobile device

ontouchmove.description: Fires when the touch screen and move, only mobile device

ontransitioncancel.description: Fires when a CSS transition cancels

onwebkittransitionend.description: Fires when a CSS transition ends

ontransitionend.description: Fires when a CSS transition ends

ontransitionrun.description: Fires when a CSS transition begins

onunhandledrejection.description: Fires when a promise isn't handled

onunload.description: Fires when the page is unloaded

onwaiting.description: Fires when while waiting for the data

onwheel.description: Fires when you use the mouse wheel
